name: The Cave God
description:
A short game made for LD43 about an annoying God and an even more annoying little human.

Controls:
wasd/arrow keys to move
Spacebar to pickup/throw/advance dialogue
Esc to skip dialogue
Throw items at the middle of the altar to sacrifice them.

The theme for the jam was "Sacrifices must be made."
To get out of the cave, you must sacrifice random items to the light God. It gets you more light and enables further exploration of the cave.
You light decreases every time you move.

There are 3 different endings that you can get.
